reviewText: The book and DVD both are fictional accounts of what would have happened had Custer survived LLittle Big Horn. They document his tactical errors in attacking the  Cheyenne and Sioux

If this is the same movie that I think it is its horrible. This portrays Custer as losing his mind and being crazy. Which is an absolute joke. Like I said I am not sure if this is the same movie I seen years ago but if it is  then its plain and simple junk and isn't worth the time to watch it.

This was a terrific movie, easily one of the ten best ever made  They should a movie of every book Douglas Jones ever wrote.  The first wo they should do would be Elkhorn Tavern and the Barefoot Brigade.
